title: Rebel without a cause
creator_credit: Nicholas Ray, David Weisbart and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: A sensitively acted story of a teenager who is not satisfied with a world he never made. James Dean’s performance is touching and exciting with an extraordinary supporting cast in Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo, Jim Backus, Ann Doran, Dennis Hopper and Nick Adams. Rated: M
